title: Capitalization Error in thresh Recommended Build
body:
"agressive" should be "Aggressive."

And there's two g's in "aggressive."

replies.body:
Hey RobTheTank,

Thanks for the report! This issue should be resolved shortly! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Ok. I'm kinda nerdy and I notice spelling / grammar / punctuation errors a lot. I also reported a grammar error with the mastery pages in PBE.

BTW this is now the second time I've seen this Vi(?) clip art (the first was the first comment). Does it mean anything?
Nope! They're just stickers for the boards. :] (It's actually Slayer Jinx!) You can use stickers on boards posts, they're located to the left of the brown 'Post' button!
Capitalization error in my topic name as well. Should be "Thresh," not "thresh."
